titles: A remonstrance to the creditors of the Common-wealth of England, concerning the publique debts of the nation.
author: Chidley, Samuel.
notes: Dated and signed at end: From my House in Bow-lane, London, this 19 of December, 1653. S: Chidley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Debts, Public --  England --  Early works to 1800.
